content:
you will write a plan of key information for this show. In this plan, 
Don’t mention the cast. Don’t mention the production. Just focus on the story, characters, and what makes it amazing. Overall, make this plan extremely interesting and compelling…sell in the show to the reader! Keep it brief...sentence fragments are okay

write the plan in this format:
the show name: Hot Boy Summer
start with a a short, compelling logline sentence fragment like on a poster, not a summary of the show
show genre & tone & similar projects (ideally succesful ones) 
a 1 sentence summary of the first season’s plot arc which covers different things than the show summary
the show's original twist: keep it short, punchy, and don't just restate the logline or first season summary
three compelling bullets (which can be thorough) on why this show will succeed (don’t just restate what’s already been said). 

Put all of the labels on their own lines with their content underneath like. 
Title
the title

incorporate these key points throughout this plan: the importance of the family unit even in an unconditional way
